about_the_game:
Take raider bounties, explore and scavenge a post apocalyptic world. Game is in early access and may undergo major gameplay changes and content updates.

Features:

  • Raider Bounties

    Find and eliminate raiders to earn cash.

  • Mega Deluxe Art Style!

    Detailed, hand-crafted post-apocalyptic environments, created in a unique style, are waiting to fulfill your deepest post-apocalyptic desires!

  • Bring on the combat!

    Fight raiders, raider bosses & wasteland mutants.

  • Upgrade guns

    Scavenge the wasteland to upgrade your weapons. (coming in next update)

  • New jobs, survival, character upgrades, gun upgrades and leveling is coming soon with early access updates and content updates such as new locations, weapons, enemies & more.

name: WastePunk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 GB, or Intel Arc A750, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660s, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Third person post apocalyptic action shooter. Take jobs in form of raider bounties to earn cash and explore a post apocalyptic wasteland.
